articles.title: U.S. Muscle-flexing Can Never Browbeat DPRK: Foreign Ministry Spokesman
articles.content:
U.S. Muscle-flexing Can Never Browbeat DPRK: Foreign Ministry Spokesman
 Pyongyang, April 21 (KCNA) -- A spokesman for the Foreign Ministry of the DPRK released the following statement on Friday:
					 The situation on the Korean Peninsula and in the region has reached an extremely dangerous phase due to the mad-cap nuclear war provocations of the U.S. to violate the sovereignty and vital rights of the DPRK at any cost.
					
					 Recently, the authorities of the Trump Administration are spouting a load of rubbish calling for browbeating the DPRK by force of arms every day. They are crying out for settling the issue with the help of someone, seeking to bring nuclear aircraft carrier strike groups one after another to the waters off the Korean Peninsula.
					
					 Such intimidation and blackmail can never frighten the DPRK.
					
					 The invincible revolutionary Paektusan army, closely following the maneuvers of the U.S., is waiting for an order only after rounding off its full preparedness to counter them immediately.
					
					 It is an unshakable will of the DPRK to go to the end if the U.S. wants to remain unchanged in its confrontational stance.
					
					 The army of the DPRK has already clarified that its heaviest counteractions include a sudden preemptive attack involving maneuvers on the ground, in seas, under waters and in the air and various other methods and the Korean-style tough counter-actions will be promptly taken to cope with the provocations of any forms and levels from the U.S.
					
					 The world will clearly witness this time the fact that gone are the days never to return when the U.S. forced its will upon other countries.
					
					 The DPRK, a peace-loving socialist state, is setting great store by peace. But it neither fears a war nor wants to avoid it.
					
					 The DPRK is a nuclear power capable of countering any option and means of the U.S. and will not avoid any option made by it.
					
					 As the DPRK had access to a powerful nuclear deterrent to protect itself from the U.S. nuclear threat, the DPRK will react to a total war with an all-out war, a nuclear war with nuclear strikes of its own style and surely win a victory in the death-defying struggle against the U.S. imperialists.

articles.title: Foreign Ministry Spokesman Snipes at Australian FM's Tongue-lashing against DPRK
articles.content:
Foreign Ministry Spokesman Snipes at Australian FM's Tongue-lashing against DPRK
 Pyongyang, April 21 (KCNA) -- A spokesman for the Foreign Ministry of the DPRK gave the following answer to the question raised by KCNA Friday as regards the fact that the foreign minister of Australia malignantly pulled up the DPRK:
					 The foreign minister of Australia in a recent radio program spouted a string of rubbish against the DPRK over its entirely just steps for self-defence, claiming that it seriously threatens regional and global peace and she supports the DPRK policy of the U.S. administration that all choices are on the table.
					
					 What she uttered can never be pardoned as it is an act against peace that patronizes and shields the U.S. extreme hostile policy toward the DPRK and nuclear threats and blackmail against it, the root cause of the grave situation prevailing on the Korean Peninsula, and encourages the U.S. to opt for reckless and risky military actions.
					
					 The present government of Australia is blindly and zealously toeing the U.S. line.
					
					 It is hard to expect good words from the foreign minister of such government. But if she is the foreign minister of a country, she should speak with elementary common sense about the essence of the situation.
					
					 It is entirely attributable to the nuclear threat escalated by the U.S. and its anachronistic policy hostile to the DPRK that the situation on the Korean Peninsula is inching close to the brink of war in an evil cycle of increasing tensions.
					
					 If Australia persists in following the U.S. moves to isolate and stifle the DPRK and remains a shock brigade of the U.S. master, this will be a suicidal act of coming within the range of the nuclear strike of the strategic force of the DPRK.
					
					 The Australian foreign minister had better think twice about the consequences to be entailed by her reckless tongue-lashing before flattering the U.S.

articles.title: DPRK Will Not Rule out Any Option for Peace of Korean Peninsula and Region: KAPPC Spokesman
articles.content:
DPRK Will Not Rule out Any Option for Peace of Korean Peninsula and Region: KAPPC Spokesman
 Pyongyang, April 21 (KCNA) -- A spokesman for the Korea Asia-Pacific Peace Committee released a statement Friday in connection with the fact that the situation on the Korean peninsula is getting serious with each passing day due to the U.S. ferocious military threat and nuclear blackmail.
					 The Trump administration, which had been examining the package options for the last two months, finally began to show reckless moves after adopting it as its DPRK policy to make "supreme pressure and intervention", the statement said, adding:
					
					 After perpetrating sudden cruise missile attack on Syria, the U.S. described it as a "strong warning" to the DPRK and has introduced massive strategic assets into the Korean peninsula while crying out for independent military counteraction including "preemptive attack on the north".
					
					 U.S. Vice-President Pence during his recent visit to south Korea talked big to dare threaten the DPRK, saying that the DPRK should not misjudge the U.S.' will, the era of "strategic patience" was over and there is an urge to complete the program for nuclear and ballistic missile development.
					
					 The conservative group of south Korea, including puppet acting president Hwang Kyo An, spouted bellicose rubbish that "they would take unbearable punitive measure in case the north makes additional provocation" and "they will make the north change its strategic calculation". They have gone desperate while talking about intensive large-scale joint exercises together with the U.S. nuclear carrier task force.
					
					 Saying the present situation proves that the U.S. and the puppet forces are a kingpin seriously threatening and harassing the peace and stability on the Korean peninsula and the region and that they are war fanatics obsessed with provocation and aggression, the spokesman clarified the following stand:
					
					 As a peace-loving socialist state, the DPRK values and loves peace more than anyone else but is neither afraid of war nor is going to avert it.
					
					 The army and people of the DPRK will not rule out any special option in order to defend peace on the Korean peninsula and the region.
					
					 The U.S. has to understand that it is not only the U.S. that is invested with option, and it should be serious in making the final option at a crucial moment decisive of the destiny of the American empire.
					
					 The army and people of the DPRK will bolster up the nuclear deterrence for justice in every way to foil the U.S. high-handed and arbitrary practices and thus more reliably defend the sovereignty of the country, the right to existence of the nation and the peace and security of the Korean peninsula and the region.

articles.title: Are You Good at Dancing to Tune of Others: Jong Phil
articles.content:
Are You Good at Dancing to Tune of Others: Jong Phil
 Pyongyang, April 21 (KCNA) -- The following is the full text of "Are you good at dancing to the tune of others", a commentary written by Jong Phil Friday:
					 Not a single word about the U.S. act of pushing the situation on the Korean peninsula to the brink of a war after introducing hugest-ever strategic assets into the waters off the Korean peninsula is made but such rhetoric as "necessary step" and "reaction at decisive level" is openly heard from a country around the DPRK to intimidate it over its measures for self-defence.
					
					 Particularly, the country is talking rubbish that the DPRK has to reconsider the importance of relations with it and that it can help preserve security of the DPRK and offer necessary support and aid for its economic prosperity, claiming the latter will not be able to survive the strict "economic sanctions" by someone.
					
					 Its official media claimed on April 18 that the DPRK's pursuance of nuclear and missile program made the U.S., which had been its rival in the past, its supporter now. Then question is what the DPRK should call that country and how the DPRK should deal with it in the future.
					
					 The DPRK's nuclear deterrence for self-defence, its army and people built by tightening their belts to defend the sovereignty and right to existence of the nation, is by no means a bargaining chip for getting something.
					
					 The DPRK has been so far exposed to economic sanctions but it has kept to the path of justice chosen by it with its own efforts.
					
					 The present world ruled by the jungle law makes the DPRK realize once again the iron truth that there is nothing but its own strength to rely on and that self-reliance and self-development are the only way out.
					
					 If the country keeps applying economic sanctions on the DPRK while dancing to the tune of someone after misjudging the will of the DPRK, it may be applauded by the enemies of the DPRK but it should get itself ready to face the catastrophic consequences in the relations with the DPRK.
					
					 The DPRK will defend its dignity and build a paradise for the people with its own efforts, rallied close around the respected Supreme Leader.

articles.title: U.S. Biochemical War Plan against Korean Nation under Fire
articles.content:
U.S. Biochemical War Plan against Korean Nation under Fire
 Pyongyang, April 21 (KCNA) -- A spokesman for the North Headquarters of the Nationwide Special Committee for Probing the Truth behind the GIs' Crimes released a statement on Thursday as regards the fact that the U.S. imperialist aggressor forces present in south Korea brought equipment to Pusan Port recently in a bid to press ahead with the Jupiter Plan, a scenario for a biochemical war against the north.
					 Vehemently denouncing the U.S. for pursuing the scenario to inflict an unprecedented horrible disaster upon the Korean nation again by introducing even equipment for biochemical warfare into south Korea, and the south Korean puppet group of traitors for zealously joining the U.S. in its scenario, far from protesting it, the statement said:
					
					 The U.S. has fully revealed its criminal scenario to make no scruple of using biochemical weapons to exterminate the Korean nation in order to realize its wild ambition for dominating the world.
					
					 Recently, the U.S. is busy floating the wild rumor about "threat from biochemical weapons" of the DPRK. Lurking behind this is its sinister design to secure a pretext for provoking a biochemical war against the DPRK.
					
					 But the U.S. is sadly mistaken.
					
					 The DPRK will never remain a passive onlooker to the moves of the U.S. to provoke a biochemical war against it but will conclude the standoff with the U.S., the empire of evils, by wiping it off the face of the Earth.
					
					 The U.S. must not disregard the warning of the DPRK that its reckless military moves would lead to its most miserable final doom.
					
					 The south Korean puppet group of traitors should not run riot, thinking twice about the catastrophic consequences to be entailed by their treacherous acts of conniving at and backing the thrice-cursed and inhuman moves of the U.S. for igniting a biochemical war by playing the role of its stooge.
					
					 All Koreans in the north, the south and abroad should turn out as one in the nation-wide struggle to frustrate the foolhardy north-targeted war moves of the U.S., the harasser of human peace and the most brutal mastermind of aggression, and the south Korean puppet group of traitors toeing the U.S. line.

articles.title: S. Korean Conservative Remnants' Moves for Confrontation Policy Denounced
articles.content:
S. Korean Conservative Remnants' Moves for Confrontation Policy Denounced
 Pyongyang, April 21 (KCNA) -- The Committee for the Peaceful Reunification of the Country of the DPRK issued a white paper Friday to reveal the criminal nature of the "north policy" of traitor Park Geun Hye and catastrophic consequences that ensued, and the nature of the desperate moves of the puppet conservative remnants to carry forward the policy for confrontation with the DPRK to the next regime.
					 The white paper branded the south Korean puppet conservative regime's north policy as the hideous theory for confrontation between social systems, theory for war of aggression and theory of following outsiders.
					
					 It went on:
					
					 The policy pursued by Park Geun Hye has been hideous confrontation policy against the nation and peace and reunification peppered with hostility toward the fellow countrymen, greed for invasion of the north and sycophantic treachery.
					
					 "Confidence-building process on Korean peninsula", theory of "maintaining principle" and theory of "great chance for reunification", etc. are theories for confrontation between social systems and sordid anti-reunification theories in distortion of the essence of the issue of the country's reunification.
					
					 The essence of the "north policy" put up by traitor Park is based on the hideous theory of war against the north aimed to invade the DPRK by force in line with the U.S.
					
					 Out of all the successive puppet rulers of south Korea, Park Geun Hye is the worst traitor as she has been hell-bent on sycophancy toward the U.S. and cooperation with outsiders to escalate confrontation with the fellow countrymen.
					
					 The white paper disclosed how the puppet conservative group's policy for confrontation with the fellow countrymen pushed the north-south relations into a catastrophe.
					
					 Park Geun Hye and the group of conservatives were not concerned about the improvement of the north-south relations, reunification and the destiny and future of the nation as they were obsessed by confrontational conscience.
					
					 During Park's office of four years, there has been no proper dialogue between the authorities of the north and the south, and hard-won contact and dialogue ended just in their first round. All the human and material exchanges between the north and the south have been stalled, and channel for communications blocked, pushing the north-south ties into the total stalemate in history.
					
					 The Kaesong Industrial Park, product of the June 15 joint declaration and the last lifeline of north-south relations, was shut down.
					
					 The traitor did not hesitate to push the north-south relations to extreme confrontation through unprecedented "human rights" racket.
					
					 The white paper disclosed how the remnants of the puppet conservatives have gone desperate in their efforts to carry forward the confrontational policy to the next regime while clinging to it.
					
					 They have gone desperate, being seized by extreme uneasiness as it is clear to them what fate they will meet for actively pursuing the policy for confrontation with the DPRK in case there opens the way for improving the north-south relations after progressive and democratic forces come to power.
					
					 They are trying hard to defend and justify the traitor's confrontational policy, rally those supporting the conservatives and carry it forward to the next regime and thus check the total bankruptcy of the conservative group.
					
					 The traitorous crime against reunification of the conservative remnants pushing the north-south relations into further catastrophe in violation of the nation's desire for reunification will be cursed and denounced by the whole nation.
					
					 The white paper stressed that the group of traitors would meet only the most miserable ruin for going desperate to maintain Park's hideous policy for confrontation with the fellow countrymen.

articles.title: Kuwaiti Government Provides Humanitarian Aid to DPRK
articles.content:
Kuwaiti Government Provides Humanitarian Aid to DPRK
 Pyongyang, April 21 (KCNA) -- The Kuwaiti government provided humanitarian aid to the DPRK in connection with its flood damage last year.
					 Aid materials arrived in Sinuiju on Wednesday.

articles.title: Press Release of North Preparatory Committee for Pan-Korean Conference
articles.content:
Press Release of North Preparatory Committee for Pan-Korean Conference
 Pyongyang, April 21 (KCNA) -- The North-side Preparatory Committee for the Pan-National Conference for Peace and Reunification of the Country and Development of North-South Relations Friday made public the following press release:
					 The second working meeting of the north, south and overseas sides for pan-Korean conference for peace and reunification of the country and development of the north-south relations was held in Shenyang of China on April 11 and 12.
					
					 Attending it were executive members of the north, south and overseas preparatory committees for pan-national conference.
					
					 The meeting informed of activities conducted by the north, south and overseas side preparatory committees since the working meeting early in February and discussed the working issues arising in the preparation for the pan-national conference and the immediate action program.
					
					 Its participants confirmed again that the pan-national conference should become a grand gathering involving representatives from all walks of life including the authorities and vowed to realize the pan-national conference without fail within this year.
					
					 For the present, the north, south and overseas sides agreed to jointly celebrate the 17th publication anniversary of the June 15 Joint Declaration and hold the third working meeting of the three sides for pan-national conference on this occasion.
					
					 During the period of the meeting, there took place working contacts among representative of various strata including workers, farmers and women in the north and the south.
					
					 It was agreed at the contacts to promote such joint events as meeting of representatives of organizations of workers and farmers between the north and the south, their meeting and football match between the workers of the north and the south in the period of celebrating the publication anniversaries of the north-south declarations from June 15 to October 4.

articles.title: DPRK Foreign Ministry Delegation to Visit Arab Countries
articles.content:
DPRK Foreign Ministry Delegation to Visit Arab Countries
 Pyongyang, April 21 (KCNA) -- A delegation of the DPRK Foreign Ministry led by Vice-Minister Sin Hong Chol left here Friday to visit some Arabian countries.

articles.title: Oratorical Meeting of Youths Marks Anniversary of KPA
articles.content:
Oratorical Meeting of Youths Marks Anniversary of KPA
 Pyongyang, April 21 (KCNA) -- Youth and students held an oratorical meeting in front of the Monument to the Victorious Fatherland Liberation War on Friday to celebrate the 85th anniversary of the Korean People's Army.
					 Present there were Choe Ryong Hae, Kim Sung Du, chairman of the Education Commission, Jon Yong Nam, first secretary of the C.C., Youth League, officials concerned, youth league officials and youth and students.
					
					 Performers told about their pride and honor of having the invincible revolutionary armed forces, founded and strengthened by the brilliant commanders of Mt Paektu.
					
					 They praised the revolutionary feats of President Kim Il Sung who set the most brilliant example in building regular armed forces with his rare military wisdom and distinguished commanding art and made the ever-victorious history of the KPA.
					
					 They also told about the long journey of Songun made by leader Kim Jong Il. 
					
					 Thanks to the road of independence, the path of Songun covered by him, the DPRK could emerge a nuclear power in the East and the world's military giant no enemy dare attack, they stressed.
					
					 They said that the dignity and might of Songun Korea would be displayed to the full under the guidance of respected Supreme Leader Kim Jong Un.

articles.title: Film Show Arranged for Military Attaches Corps
articles.content:
Film Show Arranged for Military Attaches Corps
 Pyongyang, April 21 (KCNA) -- The DPRK Ministry of the People's Armed Forces arranged a film show for the military attaches here Friday on the occasion of the 85th anniversary of the founding of the Korean People's Army.
					 The participants watched a Korean documentary film dealing with the immortal feats of respected Supreme Leader Kim Jong Un.

articles.title: Women's Union Members Meet with War Veteran
articles.content:
Women's Union Members Meet with War Veteran
 Pyongyang, April 21 (KCNA) -- Women's union officials and members met with a war veteran at the Hall of Women on Friday on the occasion of the 85th anniversary of the Korean People's Army.
					 Present at the meeting were Jang Chun Sil, chairwoman of the Central Committee of the Socialist Women's Union of Korea, and officials and members of the union.
					
					 Ju Jae Hyon, a war veteran, made a speech at the meeting.
					
					 He told them about the Songun leadership feats of President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il.
					
					 It was thanks to the great leaders that the DPRK could defeat the U.S. imperialists in the Fatherland Liberation War and emerge victorious in the showdown with the U.S-led imperialists century after century, he stressed.
					
					 He recalled that he joined the People's Army at the age of 17 and fought many battles such as the battle of the River Rakdong and the battle of Mt Wolbi.
					
					 He also told that the KPA fighters captured Height 351, the enemy vouched as "line of no retreat", just in 15 minutes by applying the Juche-based war methods advanced by the President.

articles.title: Agricultural Workers Hold Oratorical Meeting
articles.content:
Agricultural Workers Hold Oratorical Meeting
 Pyongyang, April 21 (KCNA) -- Officials of the Union of Agricultural Workers of Korea (UAWK) and agricultural workers had an oratorical meeting at the People's Palace of Culture on Friday to mark the 85th anniversary of the Korean People's Army.
					 Present there were Kim Chang Yop, chairman of the Central Committee of the UAWK, officials of the UAWK and agricultural workers in Pyongyang City.
					
					 Performers at the meeting praised the exploits of President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il for the Songun revolution.
					
					 They noted that President Kim Il Sung founded the first revolutionary armed forces of Juche type and developed the KPA into the matchlessly strong army.
					
					 They also told about the feats leader Kim Jong Il performed to reliably defend the socialist cause and build up the military muscle of the powerful revolutionary Paektusan army with his unique Songun politics.
					
					 They referred to the devoted efforts made by leader Kim Jong Il and respected Supreme Leader Kim Jong Un while making long journey of Songun.
					
					 They expressed the will to follow the work style of the preceding patriotic farmers who upheld the country with increased grain production and devote patriotic sweat and unblemished conscience to the country.

articles.title: Egyptian Guest Arrives
articles.content:
Egyptian Guest Arrives
 Pyongyang, April 21 (KCNA) -- Naguib Sawiris, executive chairman of the Orascom Telecom Media and Technology Holdings SAE of Egypt, arrived here Friday.

articles.title: Floral Tribute Paid to Kim Il Sung, Kim Jong Il
articles.content:
Floral Tribute Paid to Kim Il Sung, Kim Jong Il
 Pyongyang, April 21 (KCNA) -- The executive chairman of the Orascom Telecom Media and Technology Holdings SAE of Egypt and other foreign guests visited the statues of President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il on Mansu Hill on Friday.
					 They laid bunches of flowers at the statues of the great leaders and paid tribute to them.

articles.title: British Delegation Visits Pyongyang Mission of AINDF
articles.content:
British Delegation Visits Pyongyang Mission of AINDF
 Pyongyang, April 21 (KCNA) -- A delegation of the British Association for the Study of Songun Policy led by Chairman Dermot Hudson, who took part in the celebrations of the Day of the Sun, Friday visited the Pyongyang mission of the Anti-Imperialist National Democratic Front.
					 Chief Jo Il Min and members of the mission greeted the guests and had a talk with them.
					
					 They stressed the need to strengthen solidarity and unity in the struggle against the undisguised nuclear war games and anti-DPRK moves of the U.S. imperialists and the south Korean puppet warmongers and for peace and reunification of the Korean peninsula.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un Receives Order of Honor from Poland
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un Receives Order of Honor from Poland
 Pyongyang, April 21 (KCNA) -- Respected Supreme Leader Kim Jong Un received a Cross Order of Honor of the Polish People's Army from the Tradition Association of the Polish People's Army on the occasion of the 85th founding anniversary of the Korean People's Army.
					 The order and diploma to Kim Jong Un were conveyed to the DPRK ambassador to Poland on April 12.
					
					 The chairman of the Association said that they could not repress admiration at the guts and strategy of Kim Jong Un boldly standing against the U.S. to defend the sovereignty and dignity of the country and the nation and decided to award the order of honor of the Association to him reflecting the mind of veterans on the occasion of the 85th anniversary of the KPA.

articles.title: Letter to Kim Jong Un from Koreans in China
articles.content:
Letter to Kim Jong Un from Koreans in China
 Pyongyang, April 21 (KCNA) -- Respected Supreme Leader Kim Jong Un received a letter from the members of a congratulatory group of the General Association of Koreans in China and a delegation of veteran officials of the association on Wednesday. They visited the homeland to celebrate the birth anniversary of President Kim Il Sung.
					 Noting that the celebrations of the Day of the Sun strikingly demonstrated to the whole world the dignity of Kim Il Sung's Korea dashing toward the final victory in the building of a socialist power by dint of single-minded unity of the army and people closely united around the respected Supreme Leader and in the spirit of the self-reliance and self-development, the letter said:
					
					 Going round Ryomyong Street successfully completed at the best level as a cradle of happiness for the people thanks to your politics of warm love and watching the military parade which displayed the might of the invincible army and the public procession of Pyongyang citizens which is unimaginable in other countries, we clearly witnessed the heroic spirit of the people at homeland who devotedly and single-mindedly uphold the grandiose plan of the Supreme Leader for building a socialist power and the tremendous economic potentials of socialist Korea and keenly realized once again that all sorts of mean and base sanctions racket and war provocations by the enemies are bound to go belly-up.
					
					 As we received warm love and trust shown by you as nutrient of our life during our stay at homeland, we are filled with a strong resolution to devote ourselves to the work for glorifying the undying revolutionary exploits of President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il for all ages, remaining true to your high intention anywhere and anytime.

articles.title: Foreigners and Overseas Compatriots Leave
articles.content:
Foreigners and Overseas Compatriots Leave
 Pyongyang, April 21 (KCNA) -- A delegation of the Kimjongilia Association of Mongolia and the general manager of the Dandong Jianyuan Commercial Company of China and his party left here Friday after taking part in the 19th Kimilsungia Festival.
					 Departing earlier were the general manager of the Kimilsungia-Kimjongilia Greenhouse in Dandong of China and his party, the director of the Pictorial of Artists in China and his party, a delegation of the Dandong, China, Tianri Trading Co. Ltd, a delegation of the Jiesibo Trading Co., Ltd in Shenyang of China, the former vice-president of the Yanbian University of Science and Technology of China and his party and the general manger of China's Yanbian Tiansheng Commercial Co. Ltd., and his party.

articles.title: Removal to New Apartment Houses Goes on
articles.content:
Removal to New Apartment Houses Goes on
 Pyongyang, April 21 (KCNA) -- Many families are moving into new apartment houses in Ryomyong Street, splendidly built as a model of Juche-oriented architecture, is going on in the DPRK.
					 In an interview with KCNA, Dr. and Assistant Prof. Kang Chol, teacher of Kim Il Sung University, who moved to the 70-storied skyscraper, said:
					
					 Everything seems to me like a dream.
					
					 I can not repress my gratitude to the Workers' Party of Korea (WPK) for presenting educators with these excellent houses. It is our moral obligation to repay the loving care shown by respected Marshal Kim Jong Un for educators.
					
					 I am fully determined to fulfill my duty in turning the university into the most prestigious one in the world, true to the WPK's idea of attaching importance to education and talents.
					
					 Ho Chun Sam, a new resident in the street, said:
					
					 I am nearly 70 years old, but the state gave me this house free of charge.
					
					 There is no such a grateful system in the world as the one in my country that gives such excellent house with all facilities even to old men like me. I want to make a deep bow to respected Marshal Kim Jong Un.
					
					 Pang Pok Sun, wife of Kim Sung Hun, a worker of the Central Wholesale Store under the Ministry of Commerce, said that the rosier future is in store for the DPRK people as they are led by the respected Marshal.

articles.title: Kang Pan Sok, Great Mother of Korea
articles.content:
Kang Pan Sok, Great Mother of Korea
 Pyongyang, April 21 (KCNA) -- It has been 125 years since Kang Pan Sok, an indomitable revolutionary fighter and an outstanding leader of the Korean women's movement, was born.
					 On this occasion, the DPRK people recall with deep emotion the noble revolutionary life of Kang Pan Sok who brought up President Kim Il Sung and worked for his revolutionary cause.
					
					 Kim Il Sung in his reminiscences "With the Century" said: 
					
					 "Her whole life served as a textbook for me in implanting in me a true view on life and on the revolution."
					
					 Her love for the President was not merely maternal affection, but great revolutionary devotion which had instilled into him that the loyalty to the country should always be ahead of filial duty.
					
					 Therefore, it was unforgettable for the President in his lifetime that she let him leave for Linjiang of China and pushed him off without allowing him even to stay for one night, when he returned home after making a 250-mile journey on foot at the age of thirteen in January Juche 14 (1925).
					
					 When he went to see her in sickbed in Xiaoshahe, she said that a man who has turned out with a determination to win back his country should think of his lost country and its people rather than worrying about household affairs and pushed him off to south Manchuria despite her lonely life in her sickbed.
					
					 Her words served as an unyielding will and faith which made him tide over all adversities during the anti-Japanese armed struggle.
					
					 With the will and faith, he achieved the historic cause of national liberation and built the Korean-style socialism centered on the popular masses.
					
					 Today the undying feats of Kang Pan Sok, who devoted her all to the country, the people and the revolution, are further glorified thanks to respected Supreme Leader Kim Jong Un.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun Calls for Stepping up All-Out Offensive
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun Calls for Stepping up All-Out Offensive
 Pyongyang, April 21 (KCNA) -- Ryomyong Street built in the area of the Kumsusan Palace of the Sun, the sacred temple of Juche, is a gift of loyalty the army and people presented to President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il and a precious result brought by the inexhaustible national power of socialist Korea.
					 Rodong Sinmun stresses this in an editorial Friday. The editorial goes on:
					
					 The construction of Ryomyong Street was a fierce battle to smash to pieces the imperialists and other hostile forces' brutal sanctions and scheme to get rid of precious everything of the Korean people and stamp out their right to existence, in the indomitable offensive spirit of Mt Paektu, the steadfast spirit of defending socialism. And it was a battle of creation based on self-reliance and self-development to bring the rosy future of a socialist power in which the people's dream and ideal come to reality. 
					
					 The completion of Ryomyong Street is a miraculous victory that could be made only by the Workers' Party of Korea devotedly serving the people and a great event that dealt heavy blows, more terrible than hundreds of nuclear bombs, at the heads of enemies.
					
					 Ryomyong Street reflects the breath of socialist Korea to hasten the rosy future under the strong wind of history and the indomitable stamina of the Korean army and people who are building an earthly paradise by their own efforts and in their own way. 
					
					 It is a monumental edifice of the glorious Kim Jong Un's era demonstrating the dignity of Juche Korea and its strength to the full.
					
					 The editorial calls upon all party members, servicepersons and civilians to more dynamically dash toward the final victory of building a socialist power under the leadership of the WPK.

articles.title: Korean People Will Make Japan Pay Thousand-fold Price for Past Crimes: Rodong Sinmun
articles.content:
Korean People Will Make Japan Pay Thousand-fold Price for Past Crimes: Rodong Sinmun
 Pyongyang, April 21 (KCNA) -- The Korean people will make Japan pay a thousand-fold price for its past crimes, says Rodong Sinmun in an article on Friday.
					 The crimes committed by Japan against the Korean people are always left as unhealed pain no matter how much water may flow under the bridge, the article says, and goes on:
					
					 On April 13, 1592, Japan started the invasion of Korea under the absurd pretext of allowing it to go to Myong (China).
					
					 While carrying out the war of aggression, Japan perpetrated all sorts of crimes such as massacre, destruction, abduction.
					
					 The Japanese invasion of Korea in 1592 was a starting point of Japan's invasion of not only Korea but also the rest of Asian countries.
					
					 The Imjin Patriotic War (1592-1598) ended in a crushing defeat of Japan in November 1598 thanks to the do-or-die resistance of the Korean people.
					
					 The barbarities of the Japanese forces of aggression against the Korean nation were the worst state-sponsored crimes that can never be pardoned
					
					 The descendants of samurais have the same territorial ambition as Toyotomi Hideyoshi had.
					
					 Hirobumi Ito, who cooked up the "Ulsa Five-point Treaty" through gangster-like acts in 1905 to deprive Korea of its sovereignty, started the colonial fascist rule over it, saying that Toyotomi's wish come true, and then the top class war criminal Tojo unleashed the Pacific War.
					
					 From the historical point of view, Japan is the sworn enemy of the Korean people as it committed unethical crimes against them.
					
					 The Japanese reactionaries' impudent act of repeating the crime-woven history far from reflecting on their crimes is arousing the surging anger from among the Korean people.

articles.title: Building of New Society and Uprooting of Evil Practices Urged in S. Korea
articles.content:
Building of New Society and Uprooting of Evil Practices Urged in S. Korea
 Pyongyang, April 21 (KCNA) -- According to the south Korean online paper Tongil News, the Society of April Revolution in south Korea held a meeting in Seoul on April 18 to mark the 57th anniversary of the April 19 Popular Uprising and made public a declaration.
					 The declaration noted that the April 19 revolution, which overthrew the Syngman Rhee dictatorial regime, has been carried forward to the present candlelight revolution of citizens which impeached Park Geun Hye.
					
					 It is the historic task to uproot such evil practices as U.S. preemptive attack on the north, THAAD deployment, the accomplices of Park, the tragic ferry Sewol disaster and the "agreement" on sexual slavery with Japan, it said.

articles.title: Jordanian Preparatory Committee for Gathering 2017-Praise to Great Persons of Mt Paektu Formed
articles.content:
Jordanian Preparatory Committee for Gathering 2017-Praise to Great Persons of Mt Paektu Formed
 Pyongyang, April 21 (KCNA) -- A Jordanian preparatory committee for Gathering 2017-Praise to the Great Persons of Mt Paektu was formed on April 7.
					 Marwan Sudah, chairman of the Arab Committee for Solidarity with the Korean People and Supporting the Reunification of Korea, was elected chairman of the preparatory committee.
					
					 The committee decided to organize diverse political and cultural events praising the exploits of President Kim Il Sung, leader Kim Jong Il and respected Supreme Leader Kim Jong Un on the occasion of the said gathering.
					
					 Marwan Sudah, in a statement issued on the same day, expressed the will to give wide publicity to the greatness and exploits of the peerlessly great persons of Mt Paektu and conduct brisk activities for support to the Korean people in the vigorous struggle against the moves of the imperialists.

articles.title: Int'l Kothongryon Releases Special Issue of Magazine
articles.content:
Int'l Kothongryon Releases Special Issue of Magazine
 Pyongyang, April 21 (KCNA) -- The International United Confederation of Koreans (International Kothongryon) released the extra issue and April 2017 issue of its monthly socio-political magazine Thongil on the occasion of the 105th birth anniversary of President Kim Il Sung.
					 The special issue carried photos of the President and art works portraying him that show his revolutionary career in a chronological order dealt with the brief history of his revolutionary activities and the main contents of his reminiscences "With the Century" Vol. 1.
					
					 The April 2017 issue, accompanied by pictures showing the revolutionary activities of respected Supreme Leader Kim Jong Un, dealt with the facts that he provided field guidance to Ryomyong Street under construction and watched the ground jet test of newly-developed high-power engine, etc.

articles.title: Kim Il Sung's Work Posted on German Website
articles.content:
Kim Il Sung's Work Published in Russia
 Pyongyang, April 19 (KCNA) -- President Kim Il Sung's work "Let Us Firmly Guarantee the Fulfillment of the Revolutionary Cause of Juche by Force of Arms" was brought out in pamphlet by the Nakhodka Format Publishing House of Russia on April 6 on the occasion of the Day of the Sun, the birth anniversary of Kim Il Sung, and the 85th founding anniversary of the Korean People's Army.

articles.title: DPRK Exhibition Opens in Mexico
articles.content:
DPRK Exhibition Opens in Mexico
 Pyongyang, April 21 (KCNA) -- A DPRK book, photo and craftwork exhibition opened at the Pyongyang Cultural Interchange Centre in Mexico on April 13 to mark the Day of the Sun, the birth anniversary of President Kim Il Sung.
					 On display at its venue were photos showing the revolutionary careers and exploits of President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il and the revolutionary activities of respected Supreme Leader Kim Jong Un.
					
					 There were also their works, books and photos showing the struggle of the Korean army and people and craftwork associated with wisdom and talents of the Korean nation.
					
					 The participants in its opening ceremony laid a floral basket before the photos of the President and paid tribute to him.
					
					 Speakers at the ceremony said that they pay high tribute to Kim Il Sung, father of socialist Korea, on the occasion of the Day of the Sun.
					
					 They stressed that the DPRK making rapid development in the face of the vicious moves of the U.S. and its vassal forces would surely win in the confrontation with them. 
					
					 And they hoped that the cultural exchange between the two countries would get brisker through the exhibition.
					
					 The exhibition lasts till April 29.

articles.title: Portavoz de MINREX de la RPDC advierte a EE.UU.
articles.content:
Portavoz de MINREX de la RPDC advierte a EE.UU. 
Pyongyang, 21 de abril (ACNC) -- El portavoz del Ministerio de Relaciones Exteriores de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea publico el dia 21 una declaracion que senala como sigue:
					Debido a las fanaticas maniobras de provocacion de guerra nuclear de Estados Unidos que intenta pisotear a toda costa nuestra soberania y derecho a sobrevivir, la situacion de la Peninsula Coreana y la region llego a una etapa extremadamente peligrosa.
					
					En estos dias, las autoridades de la administracion norteamericana de Trump sueltan cada dia los disparates belicosos contra nosotros e intentan introducir uno tras otro en las aguas maritimas de la Peninsula Coreana los colectivos de ataque de portaaviones nuclear.
					
					Por otra parte, hablan de la resolucion del problema por conducto de alguien.
					
					Pero, no nos asustamos con la amenaza y chantaje de EE.UU.
					
					Nuestro ejercito revolucionario del monte Paektu esta observando en alerta los movimientos de EE.UU. y esperando la orden luego de hacer todos los preparativos posibles para hacer frente inmediato.
					
					Es nuestra voluntad inconmovible confrontar hasta el fin con EE.UU. si el imperio desea el enfrentamiento con nosotros.
					
					Ya nuestro ejercito habia declarado que entre nuestras reacciones superintransigentes hay diversos modos inclusive el ataque inesperado y preventivo acompanado la movilidad en la tierra, el mar, la profundidad de agua y el espacio aereo y que todas las provocaciones del pais norteamericano se afrontaran con la reaccion intransigente a nuestro estilo que se conviene a sus generos y niveles.
					
					Esta vez, el mundo vera con sus propios ojos que ya paso para siempre la epoca en que el imperio norteamericano imponia a otro su voluntad.
					
					Siendo un Estado socialista amante de paz, nuestra Republica aprecia la paz mas que otros, pero no teme jamas la guerra ni quiere evitarla.
					
					La RPDC es una potencia nuclear que cuenta con suficiente capacidad de responder a cualesquier opciones y medios que tiene EE.UU. y no evitara cualquier opcion de EE.UU.
					
					Puesto que poseemos las poderosas armas nucleares para defendernos desde la amenaza nuclear de EE.UU., nos enfrentaremos a la guerra total con la guerra total y a la guerra nuclear con el golpe nuclear de nuestro estilo y saldremos sin falta victoriosos en la confrontacion decisiva con el imperialismo yanqui.

articles.title: Portavoz de MINREX denuncia palabras anti-RPDC de canciller australiano
articles.content:
Portavoz de MINREX denuncia palabras anti-RPDC de canciller australiano
Pyongyang, 21 de abril (ACNC) -- A la pregunta formulada por un reportero de la ACNC en relacion con que el canciller australiano provoco a la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea, el portavoz del MINREX de la RPDC dio el dia 21 la siguiente respuesta.
					En un programa de radio, el canciller australiano cuestiono las justas medidas autodefensivas de la RPDC diciendo que esta amenaza gravemente la paz de la region y el resto del mundo y que el mismo apoya la politica sobre la RPDC de la administracion norteamericana de que todos los proyectos de opcion estan sobre la mesa.
					
					Tales disparates intolerables del diplomatico australiano devienen un acto antipacifico que ampara la extremada politica hostil a la RPDC y la amenaza y chantaje nucleares de EE.UU., origen de la peligrosisima situacion creada en la Peninsula Coreana, e instiga al imperio a las imprudentes aventuras militares.
					
					El gobierno actual de Australia obedece a ciegas la politica norteamericana.
					
					Si es canciller de un pais, deberia decir con el conocimiento basico sobre la esencia del estado.
					
					Ahora se aproxima a un estado muy tirante la situacion de la Peninsula Coreana que cayo en el circulo vicioso de exacerbacion de tension, lo que se debe enteramente a la creciente amenaza nuclear y la anacronica politica hostil de EE.UU. a la RPDC.
					
					Si Australia sigue desempenando como ahora la brigada de choque de su amo norteamericano sumandose a las maniobras anti-RPDC de EE.UU., se convertira en un blanco de las armas nucleares de nuestras fuerzas estrategicas.
					
					Aconsejamos al canciller australiano que antes que adular a EE.UU., piense con serenidad cual consecuencia engendraran sus palabras.

articles.title: RPDC no vacilara en tomar todas opciones especiales, senala portavoz de CCPAP
articles.content:
RPDC no vacilara en tomar todas opciones especiales, senala portavoz de CCPAP 
Pyongyang, 22 de abril (ACNC) -- En relacion con que se empeora mas con el paso de los dias la situacion de la Peninsula Coreana debido a la brutal amenaza militar y el chantaje nuclear de Estados Unidos, el portavoz del Comite Coreano por la Paz de Asia y el Pacifico (CCPAP) hizo publica el dia 21 una declaracion que senala:
					Al cabo de revisar durante dos meses pasados el proyecto global de la opcion, la administracion de Trump confirmo la "maxima presion e intervencion" como su politica sobre la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea y empezo a mostrar los movimientos imprudentes.
					
					EE.UU. dijo que el golpe inesperado de misiles navegados contra Siria deviene la "advertencia fuerte" a la RPDC, por una parte y por la otra, emplaza en gran cantidad sus propiedades estrategicas a la Peninsula Coreana hablando del enfrentamiento militar independiente inclusive el "golpe preventivo contra el Norte".
					
					Por otra parte, el vicepresidente norteamericano Mike Pence, quien viajo hace poco al Sur de Corea, se atrevio a amenazar a alguien diciendo que el Norte no debe malentender la voluntad de EE.UU., bajo su telon la epoca de "paciencia estrategica" y urge poner fin al plan de desarrollo de armas nucleares y misiles balisticos. 
					
					A su vez, el presidente interino Hwang Kyo An y otros compinches conservadores surcoreanos cacarearon que "tomaran las medidas de represalia irresistible si el Norte comete una provocacion adicional" y "hara que el Norte cambie su aritmetica estrategica". Y se portan insolentemente picoteando que desarrollarian un intenso entrenamiento conjunto de gran envergadura junto con la flotilla de portaaviones nuclear norteamericano. 
					
					La situacion actual deja conocer claramente que EE.UU. y los titeres surcoreanos son autores que amenazan y perturban gravemente la paz y estabilidad de la Peninsula Coreana y la region y los maniacos de guerra enloquecidos por la provocacion y agresion. 
					
					La RPDC, Estado socialista amante de la paz, aprecia y ama mas que otros la paz, pero no teme jamas la guerra ni quiere evitarla.
					
					Si necesitan para preservar la paz de la Peninsula Coreana y la region, el ejercito y el pueblo coreanos no vacilaran en tomar todas las opciones especiales. 
					
					EE.UU. debe tener presente de que el derecho a opcion no lo tiene solo el, y tiene que hacer una seria opcion ultima en el momento importante en que se decidira el destino de imperio americano. 
					
					El ejercito y el pueblo coreanos fortaleceran por todos los medios su disuasivo nuclear justo para destruir el despotismo y arbitrariedad de EE.UU. y defenderan mas fidedignamente la soberania del pais, el derecho a subsistencia de la nacion y la paz y la seguridad de la Peninsula Coreana y la region.

articles.title: ?Le gusta tanto bailar al son que le toca otro?, comenta ACNC
articles.content:
?Le gusta tanto bailar al son que le toca otro?, comenta ACNC
Pyongyang, 21 de abril (ACNC) -- Hoy fue publicado un comentario de Jong Phil intitulado: "?Le gusta tanto bailar al son que el toca otro?", que sigue:
					En los ultimos dias, un pais circunvecino de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea no hace ningun protesta a EE.UU. que lleva al borde de la guerra la situacion introduciendo una enorme cantidad de las propiedades estrategicas en las aguas maritimas de la Peninsula Coreana, sino suelta las palabras que amenazan abiertamente a aquella como las "medidas necesarias" y "reaccion del nivel de cambio" con respecto a las medidas autodefensivas de esta tomadas frente a las maniobras norteamericanas. 
					
					En particular, dicen que en el futuro, la RPDC no se sustentara ante la "sancion economica" de alguien, que deberia meditar la importancia de las relaciones con ellos mismos y podrian ofrecer la seguridad a la RPDC y brindarle el apoyo y asistencia necesarios al desarrollo economico.
					
					El 18 de abril, subrayaron, por conducto del medio de prensa oficial, que debido a que impulsamos el desarrollo del programa nuclear y de misil, se ha convertido en su colaborador EE.UU., que antes era su adversario.
					
					Entonces, ?como debemos llamarles y como tratarles en el futuro? 
					
					Nuestro ejercito y pueblo prepararon apretando el cinturon el disuasivo nuclear para la autodefensa, que no puede ser jamas un regateo para cambiar con algo.
					
					  Hasta la fecha, hemos vivido bajo las sanciones economicas, pero, vinimos avanzando a pasos firmes por el camino justo escogido por nosotros apoyandonos solo con nuestras propias fuerzas.
					
					Las realidades de hoy en que reina la ley de la selva vuelven a grabarnos profundamente la verdad ferrea de que lo confiable es solo las propias fuerzas y solo el autofortalecimiento deviene el camino a tomar.
					
					Si el malentiende nuestra voluntad y recurre a la sancion economica contra nosotros bailando de continuo al son del otro podria ser acogido acaso por los enemigos, pero, debe ser consciente de las consecuencias destructivas que se produciran en las relaciones con nosotros.
					
					Nosotros, unidos firmemente en torno al estimado Maximo Dirigente, defenderemos la dignidad del pais y construiremos el paraiso del pueblo apoyandonos en las fuerzas propias.

articles.title: Jonminthukwi revela intencion de EE.UU. y Sur de Corea de provocar guerra bioquimica
articles.content:
Jonminthukwi revela intencion de EE.UU. y Sur de Corea de provocar guerra bioquimica
Pyongyang, 21 de abril (ACNC) -- El portavoz de la direccion nortena de Jonminthukwi (Comite Pannacional de Averiguacion Especial para Esclarecer Verdaderos Aspectos de Crimenes de Tropas Norteamericanas) hizo publica el dia 20 una declaracion en relacion con que las tropas norteamericanas ocupantes del Sur de Corea han introducido en el Puerto de Pusan los equipos necesarios a la realizacion del "Plan de Jupiter", guion de la guerra bioquimica anti-Republica Popular Democratica de Corea.
					El portavoz acuso a Estados Unidos que vuelve a imponer un gran desastre inaudito a la nacion coreana al introducir a su antojo hasta los armamentos bioquimicos y denuncio categoricamente las maniobras vendepatrias de los traidores titeres surcoreanos que se adhieren a las maniobras de su amo en vez de protestarle.
					
					Asi, el pais norteamericano demostro de nuevo su intento criminal de no vacilarse en exterminar a la nacion coreana con las armas bioquimicas a fin de realizar su ambicion de dominar al mundo, subrayo el vocero y prosiguio:
					
					Ultimamente, EE.UU. difunde un rumor de la "amenaza de las armas bioquimicas" acusando sin ton ni son a la RPDC, partiendo de su intencion malsana de preparar los pretextos de provocar la guerra bioquimica anti-RPDC.
					
					Pero, el imperio equivoca grandemente.
					
					La RPDC no estara con brazos cruzados ante las maniobras de EE.UU. para desencadenar la guerra bioquimica contra el pais socialista y pondra punto final a la confrontacion antiyanqui al liquidar en esta tierra el imperio de males.
					
					EE.UU. no debe menospreciar las advertencias de la RPDC de que sus imprudencias militares causaran la destruccion mas tragica.
					
					La camarilla titere surcoreana, que siendo lacayo, tomo activa parte en las antieticas maniobras de su amo gringo de provocar la guerra bioquimica, debe actuar con prudencia, deliberando las consecuencias tragicas de su acto servil y traidor.
					
					Todos los coreanos del Norte, el Sur y en el ultramar deberan levantarse como un solo hombre en la lucha pannacional por frenar y frustrar las imprudentes maniobras de guerra contra la RPDC de EE.UU., perturbador de la paz de la humanidad y caudillo mas bestial de la agresion, y de la camarilla titere surcoreana que obedece a ciegas a la artimana de provocacion de guerra bioquimica de su amo gringo.

articles.title: Gobierno de Kuwait brinda asistencia humanitaria a la RPDC
articles.content:
Gobierno de Kuwait brinda asistencia humanitaria a la RPDC
Pyongyang, 21 de abril (ACNC) -- El gobierno de Kuwait brindo asistencia humanitaria a la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea en relacion con que esta sufrio los danos por inundaciones en el ano pasado.
					Los materiales de socorro fueron llegados el dia 19 a Sinuiju.

articles.title: Comite norteno para la conferencia pannacional publica comunicado oficial
articles.content:
Comite norteno para la conferencia pannacional publica comunicado oficial
Pyongyang, 21 de abril (ACNC) -- El comite preparatorio de la parte Norte para la conferencia pannacional por la paz y la reunificacion de la patria y el desarrollo de relaciones intercoreanas hizo publico el dia 21 el siguiente comunicado oficial:
					Tuvo lugar los dias 11 y 12 de abril en Shenyang, China, la segunda reunion de la comision conjunta de trabajo del Norte, el Sur y ultramar de la conferencia pannacional por la paz y la reunificacion de la patria y el desarrollo de relaciones intercoreanas. 
					
					Tomaron parte en la ocasion los miembros de la comision conjunta de trabajo de los comites preparatorios del Norte, el Sur y ultramar. 
					
					Se informaron las actividades de esos comites preparatorios realizadas despues de la primera reunion efectuada en la primera quincena de febrero. Y se discutieron los problemas practicos, que se presentan en los preparativos para la apertura de la cita pannacional, y el rumbo de accion inmediata. 
					
					Los participantes volvieron a confirmar que la conferencia debe tomar la dimension pannacional en que participen ampliamente los delegados de diversos estratos, inclusive las autoridades, y decidieron lograr sin falta su apertura dentro de este ano. 
					
					Por ahora, acordaron conmemorar en conjunto el 17o aniversario de la publicacion de la Declaracion Conjunta del 15 de Junio y aprovechando esa oportunidad, sostener la tercera reunion de la comision conjunta de trabajo. 
					
					Durante la presente reunion, hubo el contacto de trabajo entre los representantes de diferentes capas del Norte y el Sur asi como obrero, campesino y mujer. 
					
					En esos encuentros se acordaron impulsar activamente durante el ciclo de festejo de publicacion de las declaraciones N-S, comprendido entre el 15 de junio al 4 de octubre, diversos actos conjuntos tales como la reunion y el encuentro de los representantes de las entidades de obreros y campesinos y la competencia de futbol por la reunificacion entre los obreros nortenos y los surenos.
